"est": A magazine article that explores the art of "low-key" networking, and how it can lead to more meaningful connections and opportunities in any industry.
"ovate": A feature on how to rekindle your passion for your job or career, and turn it into a driving force for personal and professional growth.
"Hackervate": A series of profiles on individuals who have successfully used creative problem-solving techniques to overcome challenges and achieve success in their respective fields.
"Diversifyate": An exploration of the benefits of diversity in the workplace, and how companies can foster a more inclusive and innovative culture.
"Growthrate": An in-depth look at the psychology of growth mindset and how it can be applied to personal and professional development, with case studies and expert insights.
